docstring.long_description:
The Keysight 33510B has a variety of waveform settings available.

Requires a CONNECTION_33510B node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible Keysight 33XXX wavefunction
generators (although they are untested).
docstring.short_description: Set waveform settings for a 33510B function generator.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MDO3XXX node).

parameters.name: on_off
parameters.description: Whether to turn the waveform generation to on or off.

parameters.name: query_set
parameters.description: Whether to query or set the waveform.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel to set or query.

parameters.name: waveform
parameters.description: The type of waveform to use.

parameters.name: frequency
parameters.description: The voltage of the waveform to set, in Hz.

parameters.name: amplitude
parameters.description: The voltage of the waveform to set.

parameters.name: amplitude_unit
parameters.description: The voltage unit to set the waveform to.

parameters.name: phase
parameters.description: The phase to set the waveform to, in degrees.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The voltage offset to set the waveform to, in volts.

parameters.name: ramp_symmetry
parameters.description: The ramp symmetry if the RAMP waveform is used, in percent.

parameters.name: pulse_width
parameters.description: The pulse width in nanoseconds if the PULS waveform is used.

returns.description: String: Summary of waveform generator settings.
